title: How do children get into computer hacking? - Quora

response.answer_text: Absolutely. One of the biggest hacking conferences in the world is called Defcon. It takes Place in Las Vegas, NV once a year. At defcon they have a whole section for children. At the convention last year children as young as seven learn how to hack into election systems. Kids as young as 7 hack into election systems at DEFCON event They also can learn how to lock pick, or solder on printed circuit board.
